termsContent:
1. To get the bonus, you must place a deposit of at least 1 mBTC or the same value in cryptocurrencies.
2. The maximum bonus amount is 30% of the deposit amount, but not more than 3.5 mBTC or the same value in cryptocurrencies.
3. Full wagering requires making bets 40 times the amount of the bonus received: (deposit bonus) Ã— 40.
4. The deposit bonus is valid for 5 days, starting from the date you receive it.
5. The maximum bet amount when wagering is 0.3 mBTC or the same value in cryptocurrencies.
subtitle: 30% bonus of up to 3.5 mBTC on Monday
title: Monday Reload Bonus
description:
Start your week on a high note with Slotsbet! Grabbing yourself a 30% bonus of up to 3.5 mBTC is easy:

1. Make a deposit of at least 1 mBTC.
2. Instantly receive a bonus worth 30% of the amount you deposited (up to a maximum of 3.5 mBTC).
